name: 4 oz Loose Leaf - LYCHEE BLACK TEA
description:
This fragrant black tea is scented with Chinese lychee fruit. The flavor of the lychee is prevalent in every sip of this nectarous brew.

This tea is ideally suited for an excellent iced tea. It has a slight sweetness from the lychee already built-in, and the fruity flavor is very refreshing.

Contains black tea scented with Chinese lychee fruit.

You will receive 4 oz of loose leaf tea in a brown resealable, glassine lined paper bag. Our bags are completely recyclable and biodegradable.

Steep for 5-10 minutes.

name: 4 oz Loose Leaf - TI KWAN YIN (Iron Goddess Oolong)
description:
This oolong tea got its name from the legend of its creation. It is the story of a very poor farmer named Mr. Wei. Mr. Wei lived in Anxi county of China's southeastern Fujian province. Everyday, as he walked to his fields, Mr. Wei passed a dilapidated temple which housed an iron statue of Kwan Yin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion. He was distressed by the sad state of the temple, and wished he could rectify it, but as he was only a poor farmer, there was not much he could do. But he decided to do what he could, and a couple times a month he brought his broom from home and swept out the temple. He then offered a stick of incense to the iron statue of Kwan Yin. This continued for many months.

One night, as Mr. Wei slept, Kwan Yin came to him in a vision. She told him that behind the old temple he would find a cave, and that waiting in this cave was a great treasure. The next morning, he found the cave, and inside the cave was a small tea sprout. He took the sprout to his own field and planted it, where it produced the finest tea. He gave cuttings to his neighbors, and soon the whole area was thriving. The tea had brought prosperity to Mr. Wei and all his neighbors. Soon, the rundown old temple with the iron statue was repaired and became an important beacon in the region.

Contains Oolong Tea.

You will receive 4 oz of loose leaf tea in a brown resealable, glassine lined paper bag. Our bags are completely recyclable and biodegradable.

This tea should be prepared with water no hotter than 185° fahrenheit. Use 1 heaping teaspoon per 8 oz cup, and allow it to steep for 2 minutes. This tea is good for 8 or 9 infusions, with cups 2 and 3 said to be the best.

This is an ideal tea for a traditional Chinese tea ceremony, especially the Gongfu ceremony (also known as kung fu, meaning "with great skill").

name: 2 oz Loose Leaf - DRAGON PEARLS JASMINE GREEN TEA
description:
The Chinese have, for many centuries, scented their teas with various floral essences, but jasmine green tea has always prevailed as the longstanding favorite. This delicious tea is infused with the sweet aroma and flavor of fresh night-blooming jasmine flowers. The tea leaves are then hand-rolled into balls, which uncurl before your eyes as your tea steeps.

Contains Chinese green tea scented with jasmine flowers.

You will receive 2 oz of loose leaf tea in a brown resealable, glassine lined paper bag. Our bags are completely recyclable and biodegradable.

Use 8-10 pearls per 8 oz cup. Heat the water to steaming - approximately 180° fahrenheit, and steep for 3-5 minutes (longer for a more full bodied flavor). Do not use boiling water, as this will scald the tea making your infusion slightly bitter.

2 oz yields approximately 40-50 cups.

name: 4 oz Loose Leaf - VANILLA SUNRISE (Organic Yerba Mate Blend)
description: This is our favorite breakfast tea! The perfect way to start your day. The Organic Yerba Mate gives you a lasting energy boost, but doesn't attack your nerves like coffee. The smooth, sweet aroma is simply delightful! A little cream and sugar, and you'll never crave coffee again! Contains Organic Yerba Mate, orange peel, Organic vanilla bean, lemon peel, lemongrass and licorice root. You will receive 4 oz of loose leaf tea in a brown resealable, glassine lined paper bag. Our bags are completely recyclable and biodegradable. Steep for 8-10 minutes. For a soothing, caffeine-free alternative, try our Vanilla Sunset blend, which contains Organic Rooibos. You can find it by clicking here.

name: 4 oz Loose Leaf - VANILLA SUNSET (Organic Rooibos Blend)
description: VANILLA SUNSET is a unique and delicious herbal blend. The smooth flavor of the rooibos, and the sweet vanilla-citrus aroma are very soothing, and are the perfect antidote to a long day. Contains Organic Rooibos, orange peel, Organic vanilla bean, lemon peel, lemongrass and licorice root. You will receive 4 oz of loose leaf tea in a brown resealable, glassine lined paper bag. Our bags are completely recyclable and biodegradable. Steep for 8-10 minutes. For an energizing alternative (great for breakfast time!), try our Vanilla Sunrise blend, which contains Organic Yerba Mate. You can find it by clicking here.
